title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 166.6 - Supervision and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 166.6 - Supervision and reporting requirements

State Regulations
(a) All projects for which funds are
allocated pursuant to this Part shall be subject to the general supervision of
the commissioner, who shall have the right to examine the facilities, operation
and records relating to such program at any time. (b) Individual records shall be maintained
for each adult participating in any such program, including attendance, an
assessment of the success of the program with respect to the student, and other
pertinent information. (c) Financial records shall be maintained and a report of expenditures submitted to
the department no later than September 15th next following the school year for
which a grant was awarded. (d) Each
eligible agency shall submit to the department by February 15th of each year a
report which shall include, but not be limited to, the number of workers served
in the current school year by age, by various indicators of achievement, and by
services received. (e) Each
eligible agency shall be required to submit such additional reports as may be
required by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
166.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
